summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of Cedar Street, from 4th Avenue to Denny Way; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues; by the installation of a street lighting system, all in accordance with Resolution No. 8298 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment of said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by mode of Payment by Bonds.
